indications: indicated topical anesthetic oral mucosa prior local anesthetic injections , scaling prophylaxis . also useful relieve discomfort associated taking impressions intraoral radiographs . apply required .
contraindications: using new cotton applicator , apply small amount gel mucosa achieve topical anesthesia . reintroduce cotton applicator bottle tightly re-cap jar .
indications_original: Indicated as a topical anesthetic for use on oral mucosa prior to local anesthetic injections, scaling and prophylaxis. Also useful to relieve discomfort associated with taking impressions and intraoral radiographs.  Apply as required.
contraindications_original:
Using a new cotton applicator, apply a small amount of gel to the mucosa to achieve topical anesthesia. Do not reintroduce the cotton applicator into the bottle
                     Tightly re-cap the jar after each use.
adverseReactions_original: Do not use onindividuals with a known sensitivity to benzocaine or PABA.
